rooms.description: Spacious living area with natural light from large windows and Vastu-optimized placement for positive energy flow.
Elegant dining space adjacent to the living room, with open design and a view of the garden.
Modern kitchen designed for ease-of-access and wheelchair navigation, featuring low counters and ample storage.
Luxury master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and Vastu-aligned placement.
Well-appointed secondary bedroom designed for comfort and accessibility.
Additional bedroom that complements the layout, ensuring privacy and ease-of-access.
Common bathroom area with universal design principles for wheelchair accessibility.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible entry door with Vastu considerations for the entrance direction.
Secondary access door ensuring easy exit and wheelchair accessibility.
